com.almeros.android.multitouch.gesturedetectors

Class MoveGestureDetector.SimpleOnMoveGestureListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almeros.android.multitouch.gesturedetectors.MoveGestureDetector.SimpleOnMoveGestureListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoveGestureDetector.OnMoveGestureListener
    Enclosing class:
    MoveGestureDetector

    public static class MoveGestureDetector.SimpleOnMoveGestureListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements MoveGestureDetector.OnMoveGestureListener
    Helper class which may be extended and where the methods may be implemented. This way it is not necessary to implement all methods of OnMoveGestureListener.
